verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%>, and passed <S%G1276>over<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> a man sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>, <S%G906>lying<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G2825>bed<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto the sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>; Son <S%G5043><s%> , be of good cheer <S%G2293><s%> ; thy <S%G4675><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> man <S%G987>blasphemeth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Wherefore <S%G2444><s%> think <S%G1760><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> ?

For <S%G1063><s%> whether <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> , to say <S%G2036><s%> , Thy sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> ; or <S%G2228><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%> , Arise <S%G1453><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> ?

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> , <S%G5119>(then<s%> saith <S%G3004>he<s%> to the sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>,) Arise <S%G1453><s%> , take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed <S%G2825><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1453>arose<s%>, and <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2296>marvelled<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> unto <S%G444>men<s%>.

¶ And <S%G2532>as<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> passed <S%G3855>forth<s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew<s%>, <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the receipt of <S%G5058>custom<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G450>arose<s%>, and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> sat at <S%G345>meat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614%G2532>house<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and sat <S%G4873>down<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G2068>eateth<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>?

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, They that be <S%G2192><s%> whole <S%G2480><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a physician <S%G2395><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> they that are <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> go ye <S%G4198><s%> and learn <S%G3129><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> that meaneth <S%G2076><s%> , I will <S%G2309><s%> have mercy <S%G1656><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> I am <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> .

¶ <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1302>Why<s%> do <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G4183>oft<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Can <S%G3361%G1410><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the bridechamber <S%G3567><s%> mourn <S%G3996><s%> , as long as <S%G1909%G3745><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> ? but <S%G1161><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> , when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken <S%G522><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall they fast <S%G3522><s%> .

<S%G1161><s%> No man <S%G3762><s%> putteth <S%G1911><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of new <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> an old <S%G3820><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%> , for <S%G1063><s%> that which is put in to fill it up <S%G4138><s%> taketh <S%G142%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the garment <S%G2440><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the rent <S%G4978><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> .

Neither <S%G3761><s%> do men put <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%> : else <S%G1490><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> break <S%G4486><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> runneth out <S%G1632><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> : but <S%G235><s%> they put <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> bottles <S%G779><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> both <S%G297><s%> are preserved <S%G4933><s%> .

¶ While <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G1520>certain<s%> <S%G758>ruler<s%>, and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004%G3754>saying<s%>, <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%> is even <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G5053>dead<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> she shall <S%G2198>live<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1453>arose<s%>, and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> so did <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, a <S%G1135>woman<s%>, which was diseased with an issue of <S%G131>blood<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>, <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%> him, and <S%G680>touched<s%> the <S%G2899>hem<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> she <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G680>may<s%> <S%G3440>but<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment<s%>, I shall be <S%G4982>whole<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> turned him <S%G1994>about<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%>, Daughter <S%G2364><s%> , be of good comfort <S%G2293><s%> ; thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> hath made <S%G4982><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> whole <S%G4982><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> was made <S%G4982>whole<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G758>ruler's<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G834>minstrels<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> making a <S%G2350>noise<s%>,

He <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Give place <S%G402><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> the maid <S%G2877><s%> is <S%G599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> dead <S%G599><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> sleepeth <S%G2518><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2606>laughed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G2606>scorn<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> were put <S%G1544>forth<s%>, he went <S%G1525>in<s%>, and <S%G2902>took<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2877>maid<s%> <S%G1453>arose<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5345>fame<s%> <S%G3778>hereof<s%> went <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence<s%>, <S%G1417>two<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2896>crying<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G2248>us<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when he was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%>, the blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Believe ye <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I am able <S%G1410><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> ? They <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3483>Yea<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> touched <S%G680>he<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, According <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> be it <S%G1096><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G455>opened<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> straitly <S%G1690>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, See <S%G3708><s%> that no man <S%G3367><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> it .
<S%G1161>But<s%> they, when they were <S%G1831>departed<s%>, spread <S%G1310>abroad<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1310>fame<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1093>country<s%>.
¶ <S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> possessed with a <S%G1139>devil<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G1140>devil<s%> was cast <S%G1544>out<s%>, the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G2296>marvelled<s%>, <S%G3004%G3754>saying<s%>, It was <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5316>seen<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%>, He casteth <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>devils<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2968>villages<s%>, <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3554>sickness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>But<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%>, he was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G4012>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2258%G1590>fainted<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were scattered <S%G4496>abroad<s%>, <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, The harvest <S%G2326><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is plenteous <S%G4183><s%> , but <S%G1161><s%> the labourers <S%G2040><s%> are few <S%G3641><s%> ;

Pray ye <S%G1189><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of the harvest <S%G2326><s%> , that <S%G3704><s%> he will send forth <S%G1544><s%> labourers <S%G2040><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> harvest <S%G2326><s%> .
